content:
API keys
API keys authenticate requests to RunPod. You can generate an API key with Read and Write
permission or Read permission.
Generate
To create an API key:
1. From the console, select Settings.
2. Under API Keys, choose + API Keys.
3. Select the permission and choose Create.
NOTE
Once your API key is generated, keep it secure. Treat it like a password and avoid sharing it in
insecure environments.
Revoke
To delete an API key:
1. From the console, select Settings.
2. Under API Keys, select the trash can icon and select Yes.
